comment:
* Utils class to help draw a snapshot on a surface.
 * @hide

variables.name: FLAG_INHERIT_EXCLUDES
variables.comment:
* When creating the starting window, we use the exact same layout flags such that we end up
     * with a window with the exact same dimensions etc. However, these flags are not used in layout
     * and might cause other side effects so we exclude them.

methods.name: private static boolean isAspectRatioMatch(Rect frame, int w, int h)
private static boolean isAspectRatioMatch(Rect frame1, Rect frame2)
public static ActivityManager.TaskDescription getOrCreateTaskDescription(ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo runningTaskInfo)
methods.comment: * Get or create a TaskDescription from a RunningTaskInfo.

methods.name: public static void drawSnapshotOnSurface(StartingWindowInfo info, WindowManager.LayoutParams lp, SurfaceControl rootSurface, TaskSnapshot snapshot, Rect windowBounds, InsetsState topWindowInsetsState, boolean releaseAfterDraw)
methods.comment: * Help method to draw the snapshot on a surface.

methods.name: public static WindowManager.LayoutParams createLayoutParameters(StartingWindowInfo info, CharSequence title, @WindowManager.LayoutParams.WindowType int windowType, int pixelFormat, IBinder token)
methods.comment: * Help method to create a layout parameters for a window.

methods.name: static Rect getSystemBarInsets(Rect frame, InsetsState state)

methodNames: private static boolean isAspectRatioMatch(Rect frame, int w, int h)
private static boolean isAspectRatioMatch(Rect frame1, Rect frame2)

public static void drawSnapshotOnSurface(StartingWindowInfo info, WindowManager.LayoutParams lp, SurfaceControl rootSurface, TaskSnapshot snapshot, Rect windowBounds, InsetsState topWindowInsetsState, boolean releaseAfterDraw)

static Rect getSystemBarInsets(Rect frame, InsetsState state)
